# Get Trial Balance Report

# Description

Retrieve trial balance reports.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Date - The date of the report, e.g., 2014-4.30. Use the calendar widget to select a date. This field supports DateTimeOffset type input.
* Payments only - Set this to true to get cash transactions only. Boolean value.





* Trial balance report - Automatically generated output variable.
